Description: Fragment of rim and body with handle root of Attic red-figured pottery lekanis (mended from three sherds); interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black (very worn) below; exterior: reserved band on edge of rim; glazed black on ledge; handle area glazed; band of triangular palmettes to right.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2098)
